title: San Luis Obispo, California
summary: San Luis Obispo (/sæn ˌluːɪs əˈbɪspoʊ/;[10] Spanish for "St. Louis the Bishop", Spanish: [san ˈlwis oˈβispo]) is a city and county seat of San Luis Obispo County, in the U.S. state of California. Located on the Central Coast of California, San Luis Obispo is roughly halfway between the Bay Area in the north and Greater Los Angeles in the south. The population was 47,063 at the 2020 census.[11]
